experience: You and Jon both know John Kretz, MBA, PMP, CSM, FBI-DHS InfraGard, Chris Bender, and 105 others

Hey friends, I have a friend in Atlanta who has TS clearance, seriously impressive resume and struggling to make ends meet. Spent time doing physical security, logistics, and operations management overseas... Someone in my community MUST know someone or have a good lead.
Vets shouldn't have to struggle. Help me help him.

"The more efficient thieves follow UPS and other delivery trucks, scooping up packages as they are dropped off. Two weeks ago in Lincoln, two people were arrested in a car stuffed with more than 30 packages that the police said had been swiped from doorsteps."
So now we need a place to put our packages as online shopping continues to grow.  I just posted yesterday about the decline in theft as companies continue to operate online.
I haven't had a box stolen yet but I think I need to get a Ring as a protective measure.
Has anyone been robbed by a porch pirate? Perhaps we need to move to package doggy doors, video surveillance, authorized door access for delivery? Any other ideas?
A few milestones worth sharing with my friends on LinkedIn. All of them have been earned by a very hard working and focused Team at Integrate.
1. After tripling revenue in 14’ and 15’ we doubled in 16’ and 17’. We are set up to double again in 18’.
2. In four years, we have lost zero enterprise SaaS customers.
3. Through great customer success, accounts grew to 120% net dollar retention in 2017.
4. The business has been cash flow positive for the past twelve months.
5. In our most recent fundraise, we brought on world-class operators as investors; Dan Springer, Scott Dorsey, Reggie Bradford and David Karnsedt in addition to Iron Gate and High Alpha.
We will increase the size of the team by 30% over the next couple months and are looking for top one percenters who have grit, founders mentality and humility deeply engrained into their work life.
Most of all, thank you to our customers, we focus everyday on making you more and more successful!

PDS provides IT Strategy & Planning, Software & Database, Network & Infrastructure, QA & Testing, and Support & Management IT services to commercial, government, and government contractor clients. We have the ability to rapidly increase the capacity of our project teams by leveraging over two decades of local and national recruiting experience and expertise.The teams we assemble deliver a combination of experience and expertise in tools, technologies, and development methodologies necessary to support our clients' vast needs and ensure successful project outcomes.Currently leading the IT Recruiting Team in Phoenix. Focused on ensuring success for our practice through implementation of recruiting strategies, processes and by managing all phases of the Recruitment Lifecycle.

Since 1987, PDS has been providing IT Strategy & Planning, Software & Database, Network & Infrastructure, QA & Testing, and Support & Management IT services to commercial, government, and government contractor clients. We have the ability to rapidly increase the capacity of our project teams by leveraging over two decades of local and national recruiting experience and expertise.The teams we assemble deliver a combination of experience and expertise in tools, technologies, and development methodologies necessary to support our clients' vast needs and ensure successful project outcomes.

Populus Group offers a diverse suite of talent management solutions. We recognize our customers’ varied needs for talented professionals and our candidates’ differing career aspirations. Accordingly, we offer flexible strategies with direct placement, contract-to-hire, comprehensive talent acquisition process, premier sourcing network, and e-recruiting.•Develop recruiting strategies designed to identify qualified candidates through various tools•Assisted in development of company wide Sourcing Strategy•Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of candidates through screening and interviews•Negotiate wages, benefits, and other terms and conditions of employment with candidates•Oversee pre-employment steps including reference checks and background/drug tests•Manage contract employees while on assignment•Work with Populus Group Account Managers to identify top accounts and target skill sets•Communicate effectively with others in order to create a productive and diverse environment•Maintain relationships with industry contacts to gain industry knowledge and get referrals
Populus Group H-1B / Green Card Services

March 6, 2017, Jordan was a client of Jon’s

Jon has been fantastic to work with over the last couple years. He was extremely knowledgable and connected in the DevOps space. He quickly found me multiple opportunities that turned into interviews. I felt taken care of throughout the entire process and Jon continued to keep in touch even after I accepted a new position. We regularly touch base and I can tell he cares about the work he does as well as his clients. I would highly recommend Jon if you are looking for a technical recruiter in the world of DevOps!

Jon has done a great job to place me in a great situation and anybody in the tech community would be lucky to have a guy like him on their side.

Jon is hands down one of the best recruiters I have worked with in my nearly 20 year career. He truly cares and goes above and beyond to ensure you are taken care of. I couldn't have asked for a better person to assist me in my career move from California to Phoenix. All the paperwork and onboarding went smooth, as did him getting me in contact with local resources as to where to live. I can't stress enough his attention to detail and follow through. I have received many calls and/or messages from Jon outside of normal working hours, just to ensure everything was ok.
